arcade

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.Main

  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class for running simulations.

    The class loads two XML files command.xml and parameter.xml that specify the command line parser options and the default parameter values, respectively. The setup XML file is then parsed to produce an array of Series objects, each of which defines replicates (differing only in random seed) of Simulation to run.

    If the VIS flag is used, only the first Series in the array is run. Otherwise, all valid Series are run.

    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.3.3

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception

      • makeSeries

        private static void makeSeries(java.lang.String xml)
        Creates an array of simulation Series.

        Reads through the setup XML file using an SAX parser with custom defined content handler, which creates the Series objects as they are parsed. SAX parses XML files using event handlers and therefore does not load the entire XML file into memory (in contrast to DOM).

        Parameters:
        xml - the name of the setup XML file
